text: Marcus 'Jonathan' Clift (born 25 August 1964) is a male retired British rower. ==Rowing career== Clift competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==Personal life== His brother is Olympian Adam Clift. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:British male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Great Britain Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Jonathan Clift
